Resume.texte: I'm Thomas, a front-end developer with a passion for creating high-performance and visually appealing web solutions. Experienced in JavaScript, React, Redux, and Vue.js, I excel in building responsive and optimized web applications. Explore my portfolio to see my work and how I can enhance your web projects.

projet1.description: This real estate app project, Argent-Bank, has been exciting and highly educational! It allowed me to use Redux and React to create an intuitive sign-in feature as well as a complete and interactive user page.
projet1.alt: page d'accueil du site web de Argent-Bank

projet2.description: My React Discovery Project! A very motivating project that allowed me to familiarize myself with one of the most popular Frontend libraries. Additionally, I discovered the very useful uses of CSS-components, particularly for implementing smooth animations and efficiently managing the entirety of CSS!
projet2.alt: page d'accueil du site web de Nina Carducci

projet3.description: A confirmation project on REACT. It allowed me to familiarize myself with debugging by identifying and effectively resolving code errors. Additionally, I used JEST to perform rigorous unit testing, ensuring the reliability and quality of the code.
projet3.alt: page d'accueil du site web de 724 events

Skills.introduction: As a highly skilled front-end developer specializing in JavaScript, React, and Vue.js, I bring advanced proficiency in modern JavaScript (ES6+), a deep understanding of the React ecosystem, and solid knowledge of Vue.js. My expertise in state management with Redux, coupled with effective communication skills, enables me to build dynamic, responsive, and scalable web applications while fostering strong collaboration across teams.

Javascript.description: Mastery in modern JavaScript (ES6+), including asynchronous programming, closures, and functional programming concepts, enabling the development of efficient and scalable web applications.

React.description: In-depth knowledge of React, including hooks, context API, and performance optimization techniques, paired with experience in managing complex state using Redux, to build dynamic and responsive user interfaces.

Communication.description: Ability to clearly articulate ideas, technical concepts, and project requirements to diverse audiences, fostering collaboration and ensuring alignment across teams.

Contact.paragraphe: You can write to me at the following address:

Footer.description: 2024, Site designed by Thomas Blanc using React, TailWind, and HyperUI.

projet1.description: Un projet visant à montrer les enjeux de l'optimisation SEO et de l'amélioration de l'accessibilité web.

projet2.description: Mon projet de la découverte de React ! Un projet somme toute motivant, et qui m'a permis de me familiariser avec l'une des bibliothèques Front les plus populaires. De plus, j'ai découvert les usages de Css-components vraiment utile en particulier pour mettre en place des animations fluides et pour gerer efficacement l'entièreté de son CSS !

projet3.description: Ce site a été développé à l'aide SASS, et a permis de mettre en avant ma capacité à produire des animations CSS vraiment sympathiques !
